headline: 2 Monster Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold for 10 Years
summary: Shopify should benefit from the switch to e-commerce thanks to its strong position and competitive edge.  Vertex Pharmaceuticals' expanding lineup and deep pipeline can help it overcome recent headwinds.  Despite recent market volatility, buying shares of top companies that can at least match average returns through 2035 -- or do much better -- is still worth it.
